item.title: List of materials to study
item.description: Links What is NetDevOps? Why? - Leslie Carr (SFMIX), RIPE71 also check the spotify github for production playbooks NAPALM - Elisa Jasinska & David Barroso, NANOG64 How Facebook Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Network (Jose Leitao, David Rothera, RIPE71) Compliance tools networklore.com/nk-compare-configs github.com/cidrblock/netcopa Parsing tool TextFSM Books Mythical Man-Month - Frederic P. Brooks, 1975 Solutions Initial provisioning for Cisco - inc.
